text: everyone reads applications a little
differently at yc
but here's how i read applications and
how i train others too
i try to understand your idea
very quickly
so you should make it easy for me to
have a clear picture of what you do
ideally in the first three sentences
be concise and clear about how your
product works and why it should exist
please don't use more words when you
could use fewer
i try to understand why you're the right
team to build the thing you want to
build
maybe this is because you're domain
experts and you understand the space
very well
or maybe you have a history of doing
impressive things that shows us that you
can get stuff done
lastly i try to understand what you've
done so far
have you started building it is anyone
using it
is anyone paying you for it
